attributes.action: Issue PCSO's with the correct equiptment and powers to do their job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please give PCSO's full police powers of arrest police training and personal protection equipment in the same way as you equipt your other police officers.

We need this to be able to do our job to and enable us to be effective

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
